config.EarthObeliskEnabled.name: Enable Earth Obelisk
config.EarthObeliskEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable retexturing of Earth Obelisk on the farm.
config.DesertObeliskEnabled.name: Enable Desert Obelisk
config.DesertObeliskEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable retexturing of Desert Obelisk on the farm.
config.WaterObeliskEnabled.name: Enable Water Obelisk
config.WaterObeliskEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable retexturing of Water Obelisk on the farm.
config.IslandObeliskEnabled.name: Enable Island Obelisk
config.IslandObeliskEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable retexturing of Island Obelisk on the farm.
config.FarmObeliskEnabled.name: Enable Farm Obelisk
config.FarmObeliskEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable retexturing of Farm Obelisk on the farm.
config.FlowersEnabled.name: Enable Flowers
config.FlowersEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable flowers decoration.
config.MossEnabled.name: Enable Moss
config.MossEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable moss decoration.
config.MiniObeliskEnabled.name: Enable Mini-Obelisk
config.MiniObeliskEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable retexturing of Mini-Obelisk.
config.MiniObeliskStyle.name: Mini-Obelisk Style
config.MiniObeliskStyle.description: Choose the style for all Mini-Obelisks.
config.RemoteObeliskEnabled.name: Enable Remote Obelisk
config.RemoteObeliskEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable the Remote Obelisk.
config.RemoteWarpLocation.name: Remote Warp Location
config.RemoteWarpLocation.description: Choose the warp location for the Remote Obelisk.
config.CustomFarmX.name: Custom Farm X Coordinate
config.CustomFarmX.description: Set the X coordinate for the custom warp location on the farm.
config.CustomFarmY.name: Custom Farm Y Coordinate
config.CustomFarmY.description: Set the Y coordinate for the custom warp location on the farm.
config.EastScarpEnabled.name: Enable East Scarp Obelisk
config.EastScarpEnabled.description: Toggle to enable or disable retexturing of the East Scarp Obelisk. Will require Quit to Title to change texture.
config.RidgesideVillageEnabled.name: Enable Ridgeside Village Obelisk
config.RidgesideVillageEnabled.descripti: Toggle to enable or disable retexturing of the Ridgeside Village Obelisk. Will require Quit to Title to change texture.
